#Loading and preprocessing the data
```{r}
data <- read.csv("activity.csv")
```

#What is mean total number of steps taken per day?

1. total steps per day
```{r}
tspd <- data.frame(tspd=tapply(data$steps,data$date,sum)) 
```

2. plot a histogram 
```{r}
hist(tspd$tspd,breaks=20,xlab="number of steps taken per day", 
    main="Total number of steps taken each day", col="green")
```

3. mean and median of the total number of steps taken per day
```{r}
mean(tspd$tspd,na.rm=T)
median(tspd$tspd,na.rm=T)
```
